item.title: Leveraging AI in SAP with CAP and HANA Cloud's Vector Engine
item.description: Leveraging AI in SAP with CAP and HANA Cloud’s Vector Engine Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the most significant trend in 2024, and for good reason. The possibilities for users leveraging AI are immense, including generating code, AI-supported debugging, image and video generation, text generation, and process automation. Popular AI models like ChatGPT and DALLÂ·E 3 showcase these capabilities. The real question for developers is how to harness the power of these models effectively.
